round_best: Develop a meta-GNN framework designed specifically to assess and cross-validate the faithfulness of different GNN explanation techniques. The meta-GNN would be trained on a dataset comprising various GNN models' outputs along with the corresponding, expert-labeled explanations, evaluating how well each explanation matches the labeled "true" model reasoning. This not only provides a standardized metric of faithfulness but also highlights the strengths and weaknesses of each explanation method across different types of graph-based data.
